title: cgo should generate #pragma dynexport without absolute paths
body:
by **beoran**: 
This bug report is due to the discussion at:

http://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts/browse_thread/thread/34d6a5b928242d25

The problem is that cgo currently generates #pragma dynimport with an absolute path.
This makes it difficult to distribute the binaries generated. Russ suggested in the
discussion tha tany / in the path should be replaced by a _. I think that is probably
the simplest way to slove this problem.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
Linux 386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
f776656df34c+ release.2010-06-09/release
